title: Ticket #1850: configure_uw out-of-source cmake builds broken
description:
In a scratch directory, run the following script: 
#! /bin/sh
git clone /p/condor/repository/CONDOR_SRC.git
mkdir build
cd build
../CONDOR_SRC/configure_uw ../CONDOR_SRC
make externals
make

Observed behavior: build eventually fails with: 

[ 81%] Generating grid_monitor.sh
cd /u/a/d/adesmet/scratch/out-of-source-test/build/src/condor_gridmanager && cat grid_monitor_wrapper grid_manager_monitor_agent > /u/a/d/adesmet/scratch/out-of-source-test/build/src/condor_gridmanager/grid_monitor.sh && chmod 755 /u/a/d/adesmet/scratch/out-of-source-test/build/src/condor_gridmanager/grid_monitor.sh
cat: grid_monitor_wrapper: No such file or directory
cat: grid_manager_monitor_agent: No such file or directory
make[2]: *** [src/condor_gridmanager/grid_monitor.sh] Error 1
make[2]: Leaving directory `/scratch/adesmet/out-of-source-test/build'
make[1]: *** [src/condor_gridmanager/CMakeFiles/grid_monitor.dir/all] Error 2
make[1]: Leaving directory `/scratch/adesmet/out-of-source-test/build'
make: *** [all] Error 2

Expected behavior: build completes successfully.

For comparison, after doing the above, run the following script: 

#! /bin/sh
cd CONDOR_SRC
./configure_uw
make externals
make

Observe that the build completes successfully.
